title: incoinitocc
author: incoinitocc
content: I provide virtual credit cards for binding to Google Pay (offline usage), Apple Pay  (offline usage) & PayPal to help you spend your crypto.Spend your crypto without providing private data.  Online shopping is possible too with 3DS-bypass(skips 3DS, most platforms do accept this) (Hotel, Flights, Domain, Hosting, Transport, Groceries, Clothing)Fees are pretty simple, 4% fees for loading,no currency conversion fee for USD <-> EUR, no card issuing fee until now. High Limits.Minimal load: 35$ (36,40$ with 4% fee included)Loading possible via USDT, XMR, BTC & other crypto coins upon request.Contact options: Email: incoinitocc@proton.meTelegram: https://t.me/spendofflineSignal Messenger & Threema = please tell me your Signal Number/Threema Tag via Email or Telegram, i will reach out to you.Mention Reference Code in your first message: BT.ORG
